name: Binding with Value Converters in Aurelia

content:
This week, Core Aurelia Team member focusing on binding, Jeremy Danyow, shows us how to leverage value converters in Aurelia.

# Introduction

Data-Binding is a key feature of the Aurelia framework.  This article will show you how to get the most out of your model data by leveraging value converters in Aurelia.  The content of this post is a live Aurelia application hosted on GitHub pages.  You can [view the post in full screen here](http://jdanyow.github.io/aurelia-converters-sample).  The source code is [here](https://github.com/jdanyow/aurelia-converters-sample).

> We're considering using this format for the Official Aurelia Documentation.  Sound off in the comments with any feedback!

#### About The Author

**Jeremy Danyow** is a software developer from Vermont (USA).  He is passionate about developing Single Page Applications using Durandal or Aurelia and has a particular set of skills for optimizing SQL queries.  Besides his day job he's working hard contributing as much as possible to Aurelia.

You can find Jeremy on [GitHub](https://github.com/jdanyow) and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jdanyow) or check out his new [blog](http://www.danyow.net).
